title: Michael Cohen Turns on Trump During Congressional Testimony | Angie Thomas
itunes:title: Michael Cohen Turns on Trump During Congressional Testimony | Angie Thomas
description:
Michael Cohen calls Donald Trump racist and corrupt while testifying to Congress, Lewis Black criticizes anti-vaxxers, and Angie Thomas talks about her book "On the Come Up." 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
